A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not on the top of my Star Wars list. I've loved Star Wars since I was a child\, and this made my dreams come crashing down\, even more so than the phantom menace. Disney has taken something great\, and added some good elements\, but has overall done more damage than good. \nFirstly\, the satirical elements that Disney tried to throw into the film where badly executed and just pointless.\nSecondly\, the story had no real point and could have been avoided all together. Overall the film was as disappointing as John Boyega's performance\, which was disappointing at best.
